author: CBC News
title: Golden goodbye: Canada's Brian McKeever victorious in final individual Paralympic race | CBC Sports
description: Canada's Brian McKeever is going out on top. The 42-year-old won his final individual Paralympic race on Saturday in Beijing, taking the gold medal in the men's visually impaired middle-distance cross-country event.
content:
